ja542:1.2: mā → nediso te (bj); ediso te (sya1ed, sya2ed)

ja542:11.3: Pañcālo ca videho ca → pañcālā ca videhā ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja542:24.1: Taṁ bandhanena → taṁ pattharena (bj, pts-vp-pli1); taṁ santhavena (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja542:32.3: kareyya → kareyyāsi (bj); kareyu (sya1ed, sya2ed); kareyyāsi me (pts-vp-pli1)
ja542:33.3: sāḷikāyeva → sāḷikāya ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sālikāyeva (sya1ed, sya2ed)

ja542:48.4: vedehaṁ mithilaggahaṁ → etthantare pāṭho si, pts1ed potthakesu
ja542:52.1: Svāgataṁ teva vedeha … → ayaṁ gāthā sīhale potthake na | teva → te (bj); tepi (sya1ed, sya2ed); tena (pts-vp-pli1)
ja542:54.1: Dadāhi dāni me bhariyaṁ … → ayaṁ gāthā sīhale potthake na
